name: Hartwig chess set 3D
description:
This game of chess with clean lines is typical of timeless Bauhaus style. Josef Hartwig's chessmen, designed in 1923, have characteristically reduced forms which, in contrast to commonly used figures, are symbols based purely on the function and form of the manoeuvre of each piece.

Enjoy the game in 3 dimension .

Compete with your friend and play in your own board style.

comment and like the game
